metadata.inclusion: Press the program button 3 times within 1.5s (the interval between each press is less than 0.5s).
metadata.exclusion: Press the program button 3 times within 1.5s (the interval between each press is less than 0.5s).
metadata.reset:
1. Press the program button 3 times quickly
2. Press and hold the program button for more than 10 seconds
